website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable medicine cabinet that adds a level of sophistication.
pros: Oil-rubbed bronze frame adds a touch of class
Choose from left- or right-hand swing
cons: Installation may be difficult for novice DIYers

website_summaries.verdict: A large medicine cabinet that is both decorative and functional.
cons: Some complain two shelves is not enough for a unit of this size

customer_reviews.title: Like expected from Kohler
customer_reviews.text: Like expected from Kohler, this medicine cabinet does not disappoint. Bought this medicine cabinet for a remodel of a small bathroom for my daughter. The construction of the unit is solid and gives you multiple options for installation. I chose to recess the unit to preserve much needed space. Having mirrors on the interior surfaces is also a nice touch. The bronze frame makes it look a lot more expensive than it really is. Being the second Kohler mirror I have installed, I can recommend this as a nice mid level priced unit with high dollar options.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant!
customer_reviews.text: These medicine cabinets (we bought 3) are a beautiful and elegant addition to our remodeled bathroom! Originally I was looking for just this type of framed mirror but couldn't find what I wanted at the price I wanted. Then I found these cabinets and they are perfect - plenty of inside room for 'stuff' and when the doors are opened on both (one is over each sink), the inside door mirrors allow me to view side and back views of my head to make sure my hair looks the way I want it to. The third cabinet is over the vanity table. Great quality. We have been using these cabinets for about 8 months and couldn't be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Jan

customer_reviews.title: Mounting hardware unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: I can’t imagine who designed these clips ? As you can see by the pictures the clamps don’t on my opinion give adequate safe ability to secure the mirror . The unit is heavy for surface mounting. I don’t feel safe that it can be secured to drywall to stud . I have a 120 year old home and it’s not going to fit . I cut the bar in half to place on studs but overall I don’t believe this unit can be surface mounted with included hardware . My family safety is a priority. This is a return for me .
customer_reviews.author: Mimositas

customer_reviews.title: Checks all the boxes
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Great quality. Great Price. What more can you ask for? We wall-mounted it (not surface mount) so that the vanity light shines directly onto the sink and I couldn't be happier with the outcome. Pairs perfectly with bronze hardware/ faucets.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Affordable large Medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of this medicine cabinet. It looks very high end, was not as expensive as many others I have seen, and is a good large size. For me personally the instructions could have been a bit better, but that is likely more a failure on my part instead of theirs. A few of the screws did strip when installing with a drill, but it is very secure and I love the metal and glass construction. I couldn't be happier for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT safe for surface mounting - False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the cabinet rests on one thin bar at the bottom. The top corners have little clips, non-load-bearing, that keep the cabinet from tipping forward. When the door opens, the weight of the door hangs on one of the little top clips! We drilled right through the back wall of the cabinet to a wall stud to secure the cabinet to the wall. Not elegant. Not worth $135. NOT SAFE FOR SURFACE MOUNT.
customer_reviews.author: auntnetta

customer_reviews.title: Double sided tape holding glass does not last
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. The front glass is attached via double sided tape. It is now coming apart and there is no way to access the glass in order to fix it. We have not been overly aggressive while cleaning nor do we have small children at home. Kohler needs to design the cabinet with some type of way to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Added just the right touch to our bath!
customer_reviews.text: You can use this two ways, recessed or flat against the wall. It's also mirrored on the inside with plenty of room to store meds and grooming products. It fit in with our turn of the century bathroom perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne M. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than many others we looked at.
customer_reviews.text: Well-built metal cabinet which looks very nice and goes well with our oiled bronze fixtures. I wish the mounting tray was a little longer, but it works if you place it correctly. I also wish it didn't have mirrors on the sides. It seems a little much. But I like the mirror inside. The mounting instructions took a little while to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Vidanueva5

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, well built, Medicine Cabinet🥰
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror medicine cabinet. Very pretty, big, and can be mounted recessed or wall surfaced. We did wall surfaced, and beautiful mirror panels were provided for sides. Love it. And Even the inside features glass shelves and even more mirrors. Gorgeous piece 💕
customer_reviews.author: Hawthorne House 915

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install (make sure you have someone assist as ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well crafted Kohler cabinet. Easy to install (make sure you have someone assist as the cabinet is heavy) no assembly required other than the side mirrors as I surfaced mounted the unit. Bought 2 Pegasus cabinets earlier, one unit came with a broken frame and the other hangs with a crooked door which cannot be adjusted anymore to square it up. I returned the one broken Pegasus cabinet and ordered the Kohler. My only regret was that I did not buy Kohler in the first place. The Kohler unit is far superior to the Pegasus, so much so, I am going to replace the crooked door Pegasus with the Kohler unit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A Beam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this medicine cabinet, we had to recess it and its very classy! Perfect for a small bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Beauty, great value, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the new bathroom. Excellent quality. Loved the inside with mirror on the back of the door and on the cabinet background. Glass shelves are an absolute plus. Amazing price, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ita

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The mirror doesn’t close evenly. Small gap like there is a small warp. Otherwise, I love it! Perfect size and love all the mirrors when I am getting ready in the morning. I added a round magnifying mirror to the inside.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the money. Much better than anything else I could find. However, it was difficult to put in the supports for the shelves. They're plastic and too big for the hole that they had to fit in to hold up the shelves. But, besides that it was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: It wreaks of quality!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are always written by people who could do it in their sleep. I say if you have two to do, the second one goes pretty well. It seems the pictures of details could be larger / clearer, but it turned out well and we really like it--it says "KOHLER" in more ways than one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kettle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Best price anywhere for a Kohler product. Arrived perfectly. Definitely a two person install, but very easy to do following included instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Coxey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Very well made, description is completely accurate. Mirrored inside and out, excellent quality of glass and mirroring. Cabinet is very well made. Kohler makes an excellent product. Extremely well packed, no damage or scratches. Super fast shipping and this was the best price on the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: ScrapbookLady5

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect something so fantastic1
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid, looks great! I don't have any problem keeping the door shut. Two interior mirrors make styling the back of my hair easy breezy! Love it! I do wish it came with two extra shelves because things like toothpaste, nail polish, and combs don't eat up the space. July 2017 addendum: I had two more shelves made at a glass shop for $10.00 each. Beats the $20@ from Kohler and now my cabinet can hold everything I want.
customer_reviews.author: PAJL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newly remodeled bathroom. Love that there are mirrors on the inside too. I love the finish on it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny De

customer_reviews.title: This is a great vanity! It was mostly easy to install if ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vanity! It was mostly easy to install if you have the right tools. You might want to gather a socket wrench on top of what they say you need. The photo is a little misleading as it actually sits pretty far off the wall (5 1/4"), and so for a small bathroom with a small sink below, we hit our heads on it :( but otherwise, its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love, love, love this cabinet. I was a little worried that something would come in wrong because of all the glass, but the packaging was perfect so no worries there. The price also had me a little concerned as to what I was getting but once you see the quality you will feel like you got a real steal! When my contractor installed it, he said he was afraid to touch it because he knew he couldn't afford to replace it, lol it just has that look and feel about it. Needless to say, I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty with PLENTY of room. Used this to replace a wall mounted cabinet; what a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Jmerriman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking mirrors, packaged really really well. I was afraid that something would get broke, but not at all. We bought two and both are perfect. Very sturdy and easy to install, unless you need to move plumbing and electrical... keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: David Casey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for 2.5 years, and we love the extra space they provide in the bathroom for oir many smal items. They are attractive and work well
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice medicine cabinet but have to return ! Not an easy surface mount .... should of made it easier. It’s a heavy cabinet ... the way they have you mount it isn’t that secure . Make sure you have a lot of studs to drill into to or someone who knows what they are doing ! Other than that I fell in love with it and wished it would of worked. Disapppinted it did not work in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bathroom mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking mirror in our remodel bathroom, plenty of room and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: A.P.A, Palmdale ,ca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Came quickly and safely. The inside mirrors are neat
customer_reviews.author: Ttown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our new bathroom. Well worth the price. Good sturdy quality cabinet with great looks.
customer_reviews.author: Aut 6

customer_reviews.title: a very smart buy
customer_reviews.text: The Kohler cabinet was bigger than our previous one but with all the options, quality mirrors and detailing, it really makes our small bathroom look updated and regal. We are so glad we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: LCNINSD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice--high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've not owned these very long, so I can't comment on rusty hinges or broken mirrors because of them. I will say that Kohler has an excellent reputation and customer service, so if they do start to rust I know I won't have a problem getting them replaced. I think Amazon only has the 'fixed' versions now, so it's unlikely that you'd receive any of those anyway. The build quality is fantastic. All metal construct, very heavy--and a fine upgrade. I put two of these in above each sink. They gave us a ton more space, organized, clean look--will report back if any problems should occur.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Obvious

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low cost
customer_reviews.text: This medicine cabinet is good deal. It took some work to get it properly installed into the wall, but it was worth it. I shopped around for a while and this was definitely the best value. I am very satisfied with the quality inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-crafted Medicine Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Best medicine cabinet ever. Well crafted. Mirrors throughout the inside too. Removable glass shelves make cleaning easy. This is my third one purchased for previous and current homes!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I've unpacked this and it seems excellent and well built
customer_reviews.text: I've unpacked this and it seems excellent and well built, especially considering the reasonable price. Have not used it yet. It is incredibly heavy. my one concern is how well the hinges will hold up carrying that much weight, but Kohler is a good company and I really think it will be ok. We'll see!!
customer_reviews.author: boofinrob

customer_reviews.title: The inside looks very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is very difficult to install. Mirror looks a bit different online than it does in person, it is the same product, not suggesting a bate and switch, just saying it doesn't really look how I expected. The inside looks very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC looking in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC looking in our bathroom. Truly beautiful and functional at the same time. I had to have a handyman install it, and we had to mount it on the outside of the wall, rather than inserting it into the wall. But it looks fantastic, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K Em

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Easy to install once directions were found (inside the cabinet) and understood. Looks great! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful!!! better than pictured!! lots of room, nice and big, doesn't stick too far out from the wall...just gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: really beautiful cabinet. it could definitely go with many different ...
customer_reviews.text: really beautiful cabinet. it could definitely go with many different designs, and it was perfect in my french bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ccc

customer_reviews.title: Came with a warped door.
customer_reviews.text: Door was slightly warped and doesn't close properly. Also, was shipped USPS instead of UPS. Package was way too large for USPS.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not very good design in installation.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is made from sturdy materials and looks nice. But the installation is not very safe because the mirror is attached to the wall by a base at bottom and only one clip at the top.
customer_reviews.author: don_fat

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and look great as a pair
customer_reviews.text: We installed in the wall and they look great! Quality very good and easy to follow instructions. I took the door off to install and put it back on at the end to finally level before securing to stud. We purchased 2 and I wanted to ensure they looked and were level when so close together. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Peter A Bowsher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Love the quality of the mirror on front and back of door as well as behind the shelves. Reflects light well when open. Looks great in my remodeled bathroom and was convenient because it did not need to be recessed into wall which can be very expense. Was Shipped promptly and well packaged to prevent damages.
customer_reviews.author: ms-miki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy it looks great it can be recessed into the wall or not
customer_reviews.text: We like that these are made of aluminum instead of plastic and you have a mirror even when the door is open.
customer_reviews.author: kim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Having a medicine cabinet added was a great idea. This is beautiful, so it's a plus. Only problem that is was great, but we didn't think about the mossic added around. it opens 90 degrees, but a little more clearance would be better. The interior mirrors are helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: Deann M LaTerre

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST medicine cabinet for the money PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST medicine cabinet for the money PERIOD! I have more compliments for this than the 1000 dollar granite counter top on the bathroom cabinet that is killer, yet all the people say is damn where did you get that medicine chest? Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect for our little bathroom. with mirror on the inside of the door too, two people can get ready at the same time in a little space
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in theory. Was missing the side pieces so looks like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I cannot begin to tell you how nice this is
customer_reviews.text: I cannot begin to tell you how nice this is. Find at least one stud to hang this with. It's heavy and beautiful. Love the all the way around mirrors. Ladies...doesn't matter what side you hang this to (left or right) you're going to see what you're doing just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 9

customer_reviews.title: product exactly as pictured and described
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of them, 2 to use in each of 2 bathrooms as medicine cabinets and they not only look great but are functional
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Like the mirrors on all sides (door, cabinet back and front). Give you three glass shelves, when two is adequate. Nice look and great instructions for how to install.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you really want this! It’s $22 to return now that we learned it doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. The mirror on the back of the door is what my wife loves the most! The look is very classy and the quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: dw71

customer_reviews.title: Nice look.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and love the interior being all mirror. Convenient getting ready in the mornings. Well built. Fair price.
customer_reviews.author: RoseAnne

customer_reviews.title: they really are nice. These are well made and look sharp
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. Wasn't convinced that all the mirrors were necessary, but Oh my, they really are nice. These are well made and look sharp. Our contractor installed them so I cannot comment on how easy they were to install. I would definitely buy these again, and certainly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy & Grace

customer_reviews.title: nice medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: frame is plastic and so are sides but nice. fast and safe shipping new in box by amazon. best price here. its a bronze color. only 2 glass shelves. not as big and deep as more expensive models but for the price this is worth it! great for a guest bathroom! has mirror inside too. right or left open. not hard to install esp if you wall mount it. but easy to cut a whole in drywall and mount onto 2x4's. maybe you need a handy person to do that though so everything is finished and square. i like it. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: checkitalloutfirst

customer_reviews.title: Do it!!
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to figure out some of the instructions and tough to put up, but we had read the reviews and knew that going in... it's a nice, sturdy piece and the mirrors inside are great! You can open that door just right and see the back of your hair. We are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: eric e williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This medicine cabinet is a great buy! Looks great and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a while until one day the mirror door ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while until one day the mirror door broke through the plastic door frame right the hinge, punched two large holes in it and just fell off. It supposed the door was too heavy to hold up. Thank god it didn't fall right on to my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Q Le

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Highlight of remodeling project. Loved mirror inside on back wall. Great touch.
customer_reviews.author: jimofken

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful cabinet . It's better than what I expected . When you open the door the whole back inside is a mirror .
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic master bath mirror with the bonus of being a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic master bath mirror with the bonus of being a high quality medicine cabinet. I have never seen a medicine cabinet that is the trifecta of decorative, internally functional and high quality. The finish both inside and out on this product is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: John Nino

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product far exceeded my expectations both in its design appeal as well as the mounting options it offers. The cabinet does have the so-called "bold look of Kohler;" and, it can be installed as either a recessed or surface mount with right/left swing door option. I'm very happy with this purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Aranjuez

customer_reviews.title: so good. the product seems well built and is attractive
customer_reviews.text: so far, so good. the product seems well built and is attractive...hope it functions well
customer_reviews.author: LANAE L HALL

customer_reviews.title: Love this Mirror
customer_reviews.text: We totally gutted and remodeled the bath in the master bedroom this last summer. We worried about putting a smaller mirror than we had above the sink, but really like the look of this mirror. It's perfect. It's plenty big enough and has a beautiful finish. The entire inside is mirror making it bright and reflective. Lots of space for medicine cabinet items. We recessed it and the oiled bronze light fixture just about it matches perfectly. Having used it for 5 months or so now, it seems very sturdy and well built, what I'd expect from Kohler.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Should outlast similar chests made from composite materials.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: We recessed the cabinets into the wall. This has ...
customer_reviews.text: We recessed the cabinets into the wall. This has given us back more counter space in the bathroom, making us more organized and the bathroom easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JohnNohj

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...very easy install. Mirrors inside & out make it nice when cabinet is open you can still see yourself. I would buy this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love cabinet, both inside and outside. Looks just as advertised. Well packaged by Kohler. Very good instructions inside the box for recess or surface mount installation.
customer_reviews.author: JSJ

customer_reviews.title: VERY pretty, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful! Very good quality for a great value. Has the oil rubbed bronze finish with copper accents. Interior is fully lined with mirrors which makes it seem bigger and very bright
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: great packaging, there was no way shipper was going to damage this! Better looking an quality than I expected because of cheap price
customer_reviews.author: J Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Broken mirror side panels
customer_reviews.text: Love the cabinet, but mirror side panels came smashed . Box wasn't in very good condition
customer_reviews.author: amanda ward

customer_reviews.title: Great medicine cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size cabinet so it easily stores all your stuff out of sight. It's made well and looks great. I would definitely recommend it if you need a large medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is beautifully designed and very formal in appearance
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautifully designed and very formal in appearance. Operates well and closes quietly. Matches other orb products well.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Really like this with minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad just wish the sides were not stick ons
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and works well resessed in the wall. Super happy with the look and functionality
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Morris

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Every time I buy something Kohler I'm thrilled with the quality - this is no exception. Beautiful finish, directions and install options are excellent. Adjustable hinges and shelves. Two mirrors inside, opposite side of the door and back of the cabinet (I didn't really care but very nice). You even get side strip mirrors if you decide to surface mount it, or you can leave it - it's polished to a mirror finish. I almost hated to set it in the wall. Heavy, all metal and glass. What can I say... it's a Kohler.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: really nice/ Thye seller is awesome I accidentaly ordered 2 and I was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: really nice/ Thye seller is awesome I accidentaly ordered 2 and I was able to send the extra one right back
customer_reviews.author: Cherie C. Fort

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mirror and quality is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. Looks great easy to install. Very sharp looking both inside and out. More importantly I wouldn't hesitate to order another one. Seller was great to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Mary Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It was a little more complicated to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It was a little more complicated to install than anticipated. But, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: JoeS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Wow.....this is one big medicine cabinet. Make sure you have the room and if so then go for it. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: lisagirl

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Completing a bathroom remodel and this is just what was needed. It is large enough for putting many items in and its size is very large and tall.
customer_reviews.author: Bill - Warrenton, VA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality cabinet! Looks like a mantel piece on the wall! I would recommend this cabinet to anyone looking for elegance.
customer_reviews.author: joseph milton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Finish
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and dressing looking. It matches the fixtures perfectly. Couldn't find anything in the stores with the bronze finish. My friend, Amazon, always has what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I hung this cabinet in my bathroom and it really added a beautiful touch.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. I hung this cabinet in my bathroom and it really added a beautiful touch.
customer_reviews.author: ZAMSKY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I had imagined it would be, looks very nice in my small remodeled bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: N. Fornelli

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure we'd like it and depended on Amazons return policy
customer_reviews.text: I adore our new medicine cabinet. I wasn't sure we'd like it and depended on Amazons return policy. But glad I took the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy mirror cabinet and a great item for our rental property.
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: was worried it might come damaged but everything was perfect and i am loving it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from amazon warehouse..was worried it might come damaged but everything was perfect and i am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cabinet. When door is open there is a mirror behind the shelves and on opposite side of the door. Outside trim is beautiful. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this medicine cabinet, it was the perfect addition to our bathroom, plenty of storage and very decorative!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Jime911
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent weel built product. The color was just what I was looking for and the size was just right for the room. The mirror inside just add to the excellence of this cabinet
customer_reviews.author: James V Riccio

customer_reviews.title: It looks awesome in my new bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this cabinet and had no Idea it was wall mount but it can also be recessed as well! It looks awesome in my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: BIG GUY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet, but if you are going to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cabinet, but if you are going to use it as a recessed cabinet be aware that it will only fit 2x4 studding and not 2x3.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: There are mirrors on all sides of this cabinet. I was concerned that with the 5 inches depth sticking out it would be tacky in my new bathroom, but Kohler has finished all visible sides with mirror. It is a wonderful cabinet with respect to space and looks. It is well made and durable, came shipped well too. I bought two and could not be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: LMNJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cabinets, so classy and made perfecto, we love them. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen.

customer_reviews.title: classic design and nice price
customer_reviews.text: good quality, don't know why I haven't installed this sooner. Did a surface install which was pretty straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: CK1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well built cabinet. Looks great in our new remodeled bathroom
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Big, roomy, solid, plus has the interior mirror so you can see the back of your hairdo! We get may inquiries on" Where did you GET that??" when we show peple a recent remodel of our second home-which is small and where storage is always a challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Stella n Ekko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were wonderful, exactly what we needed as part of our bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-2967-BR1 20 inch x 26 inch Aluminum Bathroom Medicine Cabinet with Oil-Rubbed Bronze Framed Mirror Door; Recess or Surface Mount
product_meta.description:
Size:One Size| Color:Oil-Rubbed BronzeShowcasing elegant bronze detailing on its frame, this 20” wide medicine cabinet features a reversible door that can be installed with a left- or right-hand hinge. Inside, two adjustable tempered-glass shelves easily accommodate your toiletries. Fully mirrored interior provides superior visibility, reflecting light to brighten the interior space. Anodized aluminum construction insures a durable rust-free and chip-free finish. Recessed installation requires rough opening in wall 19 1/4 inches wide x 25 14 inches high x 3 5/8 inches deep. Backed by KOHLER One-Year Limited Warranty
